input.sentences: there was a book signing at my library today .
they had many books brought in just for this occasion .
the boxes were stacked up in hallways .
we had to count each and every one of them .
in the end it was worth it as we sold all the books we had in stock !
output.sentences: It was moving day at the office and all workers had to sign in before starting.
Still others sealed and labeled the boxes.
Soon all was packed and ready to move.
